body: Your senses are keener among the rocks and stones.
name: Echoes of Stone
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Oreads/New Racial Rules/Oread Feats/Echoes of Stone

sections.body: You gain a +4 racial bonus on Perception checks underground, and on Survival checks to avoid becoming lost in caverns and rocky areas.
